channel.title: Ubuntu Wireless
channel.description: Hi. I am downloading Ubuntu tonight, because im done with windows, so i am wondering if my wirerless adaptar will work with it? I have a d-link range booster. But it only came with drivers for Windows. sorry for some of the spellinmg mistakes, i have the flu at the moment

item.title: Ubuntu Wireless
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

You will probably never know until you try. You could of course try google, but trying will work best.

Read full topic
